archiefmat.titel: Kopie-memorie van de gouverneur-generaal met ophelderingen over het algemeen reglement op de behandeling der slaven in de Ned. West-Indische bezittingen en andere documenten rakende versch. zaken
archiefmat.titel_eng: Copy of a memorandum of the Governor-General elucidating the general regulation on the treatment of the slaves in the Netherlands West Indian possessions and other documents related to various affairs
archiefmat.notes: Includes an index that was drawn up by the Algemeen Rijksarchief (presently National Archives) in The Hague
